original_text: They lie down under the thorn trees. They hide among the reeds at the edge of the water. They lie down under the thorn trees. They hide among the reeds at the edge of the water. They lie down under the thorn trees.
korean_text: 그것이 연 잎 아래에나 갈대 그늘에서나 늪 속에 엎드리니

sentences.original_text: They lie down under the thorn trees.
They hide among the reeds at the edge of the water.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 물가에 있는 갈대 속에 숨습니다.

sentences.original_text: They lie down under the thorn trees.
They hide among the reeds at the edge of the water.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 물가에 있는 갈대 속에 숨습니다.

sentences.original_text: They lie down under the thorn trees.
